The first line of the input contains two integers n and k, followed by a list of integers a_1, a_2, ..., a_n.
segments.label: code_analysis

segments.text: The output is the maximum number of different integer points your dog could visit on her way, if you replace every 0 with a value between -k and k. The dog visits an integer point if she reaches it or passes through it.
segments.label: mental_execution
